Package maze.datamanager

Class JDBCMazeDataSource

java.lang.Object
maze.datamanager.JDBCMazeDataSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
MazeDataSource
public class JDBCMazeDataSource extends Object implements MazeDataSource
Class for retrieving data from the XML file holding the user and maze information.
